entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2.
